turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a coffee drink for pickup at a nearby store.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get a iced Havana cappuccino at Peet's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a nonfat milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a large iced havana capuccino with nonfat milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At the East West Highway Peet's in Silver Spring, Maryland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the peet's cafe store at east and west highway.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to you via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. bye

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
